original: 潁川人，曹魏官員。與徐庶一同避禍荊州，與諸葛亮、龐統等人結為好友。之後各奔東西，石韜效力於曹魏，但終生未居顯位。
text: Yingchuan, Cao Wei official. Together with Xu Shu to avoid trouble in Jingzhou, make friends with Zhuge Liang, Pang Tong and others. After that, Shi Tao played for Cao Wei, but he did not occupy a prominent position throughout his life.
